question: Who has been has been appointed as Director-General of the National Security Guard (NSG)?
explanation: Anup Singh, who is a 1985-batch IPS officer of Gujarat cadre, has been appointed as Director-General of the National Security Guard (NSG). His appointment will be from the date of joining the post and up to 30th of September, 2020. The NSG was raised in 15th October 1984 for combating terrorist activities with a view to protect states against internal disturbances.
